subject: Another plane prediction?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Got this via Facebook.

"Weird stuff out of the box, January 4th, flight 587 Ava New York, "Bomb on
plane" came out of a friends of mines box. He is from Michigan, said that he
researched it, there is an Ava New York, and they have flight 587 leaving
today. Just thought I would let you know."

 I think there was another with this date from the group.

F-S

Go his ia Facebook.
 
"Wei d s u ou o he box, Janua y 4 h, ligh 587 A a New Yo k, "Bomb on plane" came ou o a iends o mines box. He is om Michigan, said ha he esea ched i , he e is an A a New Yo k, and hey ha e ligh 587 lea ing oday. Jus hough I would le you know."

 
 I hink he e was ano he wi h his da e om he g oup.
 
F-S
